Articles.Content:
So far we have knowledge of the planets of Glumo and Ovin, both of which are (or were) gas giants. The lack of moons we have been shown is disturbing.from these to behemoths, we only know of glumo's moon murble. Both have rings which could be moon remnants. I dont want to sound dumb but we need good moons. Look a the great moons and planets from mods like Beyond Home.

PS we need a Pluto analogue
We don't have much footage of those planets yet so it's to early to tell... btw Ovin is a Super-kerbin not a gas giant and Eeloo is already a Pluto analogue
